answers.answer: Just because you take medication for thyroid and your levels are "in range", doesn't mean they are good for you.  I'm going the same thing, only I'm not yet diabetic, though I have been diagnosed with pre-diabetes and metabolic syndrome.Sleep apnea is a symptom of hypothyroidism.
Thanks, what do you think for the reasons ? what can be done? does there is any tests? like Leptin.
What are you eating? You need to eat enough to sustain all that activity.

question: Doing strict dieting with two hour exercise,walking and playing badminton for last two months, weight scale not even goes down 1 pound, center obsesity, BMI 42. getting sweating while exercise. title: No weight loss
